clazz.doc: Encodes objects to a serialized form
typeParameters: the type of object to encode

encode(LA;Lcom/mojang/serialization/Dyna.doc: Encodes an object to a serialized form

return: a {@link DataResult} containing the serialized form of the object, or an error if the object could not be serialized

parameters: a {@link DynamicOps} for the target serialized format
existing data that the encoded object should be added to
